channel.title: storage on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in storage on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-16
item.description: Windows 11 leak reveals new UI, Start menu, and more (3 minute read) An early version of Windows 11 has leaked online ahead of its unveiling on June 24.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-01
item.description: Google Photos’ free unlimited storage ends tomorrow (2 minute read) From June 1, any photos uploaded to Google Photos will count towards the user’s storage limit unless the photos come from a Pixel phone.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-12
item.description: YouTube went down around the world, but it’s now fixed (2 minute read) YouTube experienced a worldwide outage for about an hour today.

item.title: Top 6 best Cloud Storage services – Free, Paid and for Businesses
item.description: Why should I store my data in the cloud? The computing industry has moved gradually away from local storage to remote, server-based storage and computing since the rise of the internet — what has been known as the cloud.
